name: AVAudioSession.Orientation
desc: Constants that indicate the directions in which a data source can point, relative to the deviceâ€™s natural orientation.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

items.name: static let top: AVAudioSession.Orientation
items.desc: A data source that points upward.

items.name: static let bottom: AVAudioSession.Orientation
items.desc: A data source that points downward.

items.name: static let front: AVAudioSession.Orientation
items.desc: A data source that points outward from the front of the device, toward the user.

items.name: static let back: AVAudioSession.Orientation
items.desc: A data source that points outward from the back of the device, away from the user.

items.name: static let left: AVAudioSession.Orientation
items.desc: A data source that points outward to the left of the device, away from the user.

items.name: static let right: AVAudioSession.Orientation
items.desc: A data source that points outward to the right of the device, away from the user.
